This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0187 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
I Institution bills for providerInstitution bills for provider
P Provider does own billingProvider does own billing

Additional Language Displays

CodeDeutsch (German, de)
IHaus rechnet ab
PEigene Abrechnung

name: ProviderBilling
title: providerBilling
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying how provider services are billed.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the PRA segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0187 (Provider Billing)
